Victor Lai

Blisse / About

Hi, my name is Victor Lai. I'm currently a Software Engineering Undergraduate at the University of Waterloo. This blog features some of my more memorable experiences, in programming or otherwise, and some of my opinions about anything that happens to interest me. Maybe some of those things will interest you too.

Blisse (with some variation) is my online handle. Bliss is not only my favourite word, but also one of my favourite songs.

Contact

If you want to contact me, send me a message at lai.victor.vl@gmail.com.

Copyleft

This website is built using Jekyll, a blog-aware, static site generator written in Ruby. The source code used to create this website is publicly available on GitHub.

The following directories and their contents are copyright © Victor Lai. You may not reuse anything therein without my permission. Contact me for more details.

All the posts here are Copyright © Victor Lai. Any thing else is MIT licensed. Feel free to reuse the HTML and CSS (based on files taken from TJ Stein's website and Benedikt Meurer's website) as you please. The pygments theme was taken from Matt Graham. If you do use them, a link back to this website would be appreciated, but is not required.

Disclaimer

The opinions expressed herein are my own personal opinions and do not represent my employer's view in any way.

This website is not responsible for externally hosted material, including linked articles, photos or any other media.
